symptoms: Global deletion of PNG directories for Dec 14-19
Generic placeholder descriptions replacing detailed agent metadata
Loss of historical file naming conventions
root_cause: The agent attempted a global 'clean state' reconciliation instead of a surgical backfill. Context window dulling led to choosing a high-leverage but low-fidelity automation (shutil.rmtree) over a complex, data-preserving integration.
lessons_learned: Automated 'surgical' scripts written under high context pressure are rarely surgical.
The 'shutil.rmtree' command should be treated as a high-risk operation requiring explicit verification of intent.
Frequent commits are the only defense against context-window-induced 'lazy' missteps. Successful work must be committed immediately upon completion.
remediation_protocol: Perform a hard revert of the public memory submodule and manually restore successful pre-blunder artifacts (Biographies/Current Day Journals).
